thread.title: BSNL now offers 1GB of 3G data for just Rs 36
thread.title_full: BSNL now offers 1GB of 3G data for just Rs 36

title: BSNL now offers 1GB of 3G data for just Rs 36
text:
BSNL now offers 1GB of 3G data for just Rs 36 BSNL now offers 1GB of 3G data for just Rs 36 By - February 6, 2017 “BSNL’s Rs 291 plan now offers 8GB of 3G data as compared to 2GB earlier” 
To compete against Reliance Jio, state-run telecom operator BSNL has slashed the rates for its 3G data plans for its prepaid users. The company is now offering 1GB of 3G data for as low as Rs 36, in the new data packs. 
BSNL’s Rs 291 plan for the prepaid users now offers 8GB of data with a validity of 28 days against 2GB of data earlier. The Rs 78 plan now comes with 2GB of 3G data. “Bharat Sanchar Nigam Limited (BSNL) has decided to offer up to four times extra data on existing data STVs (special tariff vouchers) available in the market,” BSNL said in a statement. 
In related news, BSNL recently launched three new calling-centric plans for its prepaid users. The brand’s new plans are available in denominations of Rs 26, Rs 2,601 and Rs 6,801, which are available until March 31st.
